column4: Hi hi, does anyone know of a way to get Rhythmbox to repeat a track instead of repeating the whole playlist? Some of my songs have the same names, but one might be a remix, so I can't just use the search tool to do it all.
repeat button?
Well, the repeat button is a Repeat Playlist, not a Repeat Track/Repeat One Song.
How would I get Rhythmbox to Repeat Track?
there is a repeat button in it
I know, but it repeats the whole playlist, doesn't it? Not one song.
but u already seen it iam sure'
no move it to playqueue
then repeat
I guess. So it won't work like iTunes or Banshee.
in banshee how does it work?
banshee is better anyways
You have three options: Repeat One, Repeat All, and No Repeat. I think it's better, but it lags on me at times... Have you used Exaile?
once i did but didnt stick to it much
exaile looks sleek doesnt it?
but mostly i use default apps
if u move a song to play queue doesnt it repeat?

Typically, I try to keep close to default apps, and particularly ones that are pointed out to by GNOME... But Rhythmbox sucks and for me, Firefox > Epiphany. x_x For some reason, Amarok doesn't work with me.
i find ekiga to be the most hopeless of all defaults
I noticed that when I played with it earlier... T_T
should i try exaile or banshee?

Try them both, I'd say. But for the record... exaile runs like Amarok, GTK edition. Banshee is very very iTunes-like in interface, although I prefer it over iTunes in some ways (aside from how iTunes CAN convert music and I don't know if Banshee can).
My preferences is Banshee. My main gripe is the lag involved sometimes with the poor redrawing abilities of Banshee since it does its interface a LITTLE differently.
